item.title: Former CNN host Don Lemon charged in anti-ICE protest at Minnesota church
item.description: Lemon says he was just doing his job as a journalist reporting on the protests at the church.

item.title: Israeli air strikes kill at least 28 Palestinians in Gaza, rescue officials say
item.description: Israel's military confirmed the strikes, which come during a ceasefire that Israel and Hamas accuse each other of breaking.

item.title: Canada's Poilievre sweeps Conservative party leadership test with 87.4%
item.description: The opposition leader received a strong show of support from party delegates, despite the recent electoral loss against the Liberals.

item.title: Watch: Frozen river hosts dance party in Kyiv
item.description: Residents in the Ukrainian capital are finding joy in unusual places, despite power cuts caused by Russian attacks and freezing winter temperatures.

item.title: More than 200 killed in mine collapse in DR Congo
item.description: The mine gave way after heavy rains on Wednesday, a local rebel spokesman says.
